name: Chicken Lord
description:
A Game Created for the Ludum Dare 33, Summer 2015 in Gran Canaria.

Link to Ludum Dare Web:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

Objetives:

Kill Chickens to fill the blood bar.

Once is full go to Altar and Summon Demon: Go on a Rampage!

Protect the Altar at all cost

Bring on the Apocalypse!

Keyboard Controls:

WASD - Movement

J - Attack

Space (next to altar) - Summon Demon (only if you have blood)

Xbox Controller Controls:

Left Joystick - Movement

A - Attack

B - Summon Demon (only if you have blood)
